---
title: "Family size models"
output:
  beamer_presentation
---

```{r set_env, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
#'load knitr
library(knitr);library(plyr);library(dplyr);library(data.table);library(purrr);library(ggplot2)

#'load model libs
library(gam);library(mgcv);library(gamm4);library(itsadug)

#'load variogram libraries
library(sp);library(gstat)

#'suppress all code output but run code
opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
load("goosemods_pres.rdata")
source("reduce_rhine.r")
```

# Family size ~ longitude

* Not a significant effect

```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
plot(mod03, all.terms = T, select = 5)
```

# Family size ~ flocksize

* Not a significant effect

```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
plot(mod03, all.terms = T, select = 6)
```

# Family size ~ time in winter

* Highly significant effect

```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
plot(mod03, all.terms = T, select = 7)
```

# Flocksize ~ longitude

* Highly significant effect. Flocks are smaller in the west.

```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
plot(flockmod, all.terms = T, select = 4)
```

# Number of families ~ flocksize

* Significant effect

```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
plot(famsmod, all.terms = T, select = 4)
```

# Juvenile % ~ winter

* Significant effect

```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
plot(gamjuvs, select = 2, residuals = T)
```
